thread.title: Huge planes help fight Chile forest fires
thread.title_full: Huge planes help fight Chile forest fires - BBC News

author: BBC
title: Huge planes help fight Chile forest fires
text:
Huge supertanker planes from the US, Russia and Brazil have been deployed to fight forest fires in Chile.
The fires are the worst in modern history and have spread to affect 480,000 hectares (1,186,105 acres) so far.
Read more Chile forest fires: Troops join fight against worst fires in decades Chile forest fires: Death toll now rises to six
